Loading library and dataset

```{r}
library(moderndive)
library(tidyverse)
data("early_january_weather")
```

## Description of dataset

-   The variables in the dataset are `r colnames(early_january_weather)`
-   The dataset has `r nrow(early_january_weather)` rows and `r ncol(early_january_weather)` columns.
-   The mean temperature is `r mean(early_january_weather$temp)`.

## Scatter plot of Time vs. Temp
```{r}
ggp_weather = ggplot(early_january_weather, aes(x = time_hour, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = humid))

ggp_weather
```


Saving scatter plot
```{r}
ggsave("ggp_weather.pdf", ggp_weather)
```
